mapper.select: select seq ,business_code ,contract ,contract_period_fr ,contract_period_to ,contract_amount ,contract_date ,demand_name ,demand_addr ,demand_bizno ,demand_cxfc ,supply_name ,supply_addr ,supply_bizno ,supply_cxfc ,product_section ,price ,sale_qy ,offer_date ,contract_cnd ,special_contract ,writer_id ,writer_name ,consent ,consent_date ,delete_at ,register_date ,update_date ,request ,product_name ,bizcd from tb_contract e where delete_at = 0 and consent = 1 and request = 1 and bizcd = #{bizcd} order by register_date desc limit #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
select count(*) from tb_contract where delete_at = 0 and consent = 1 and request = 1 and bizcd = #{bizcd}
select nvl(max(seq), 0) +1 as seq from tb_contract ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY
mapper.update: update tb_contract set delete_at = 1 where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY seq asc) as rownum ,license_cd ,license_no ,license_pd_st ,license_pd_ed FROM tb_license where license_cd = #{businessCode} order by seq desc
